edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.task

Class TaskItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.task.TaskItem

  • public class TaskItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Task Item represents one task Constructs a task using title, type, creator, and note Has getters and setters for states and other mentioned fields
    Author:
    Hiruni Nelakkutti and Isla Arshad

      • getStateName

        public java.lang.String getStateName()
        Gets state name accordingly
        Returns:
        backlog name if state is in backlog state; owned if state is in owned state; processing if state is in processing state; verifying if state is in verifying state; done if state is in done state; rejected if state is in rejected state
